00022 /**
00023  * @file   QuantMethodExprCHPReport.h
00024  * @author David Le
00025  * @date   Mon May 15 12:09:42 2006
00026  * 
00027  * @brief  Class for reporting results of quantification methods.
00028  */
00029 #ifndef _QUANTMETHODEXPRCHPREPORT_H_
00030 #define _QUANTMETHODEXPRCHPREPORT_H_
00031 
00032 //
00033 #include "chipstream/AnalysisInfo.h"
00034 #include "chipstream/QuantExprMethod.h"
00035 #include "chipstream/QuantMethodReport.h"
00036 //
00037 #include "file/CHPFileBufferWriter.h"
00038 #include "file/CHPFileWriter.h"
00039 #include "util/Util.h"
00040 //
00041 #include <cstdlib>
00042 #include <iostream>
00043 //
00044 
00045 /**
00046  *   Class for reporting results of quantification methods.
00047  */
00048 class QuantMethodExprCHPReport : public QuantMethodReport {
00049 
00050 public:
00051   
00052   /** Constructor. */
00053   QuantMethodExprCHPReport(AnalysisInfo& chpInfo, 
00054                            const std::string& prefix, 
00055                            const std::string& algName);
00056 
00057   /**
00058    * Set the CHP filenames to use for output. This overrides any prefix and allows
00059    * the caller to place the chp files anyplace they are desired.
00060    * @param fileNames - Vector of fileNames with full path to output
00061    * file, one for each cel file.
00062    */
00063   void setChpFileNames(std::vector<std::string> &fileNames);
00064 
00065   /** Destructor. */
00066   ~QuantMethodExprCHPReport();
00067 
00068   /** 
00069    * Get set up for a run of reporting probesets. Often used to open file
00070    * streams and print headers to files etc.
00071    * 
00072    * @param qMethod - Quantification method to be used.
00073    * @param layout - Where the probesets, probes, etc are on the chip.
00074    * 
00075    * @return true if success, false otherwise.
00076    */
00077   bool prepare(QuantMethod &qMethod, const IntensityMart &iMart);
00078 
00079   /** 
00080    * After every probeset computation this function is called an is an opportunity
00081    * to query the quantification method for results, residuals, etc.
00082    * 
00083    * @param psGroup - List of probesets from which probes were used.
00084    * @param qMethod - Quantification method with compute method called.
00085    * @param layout - Where the probesets, probes, etc are on the chip.
00086    * 
00087    * @return true if success, false otherwise.
00088    */
00089   bool report(ProbeSetGroup &psGroup, QuantMethod &qMethod,
00090               const IntensityMart &iMart, std::vector<ChipStream *> &iTrans, 
00091               PmAdjuster &pmAdjust);
00092 
00093   /** 
00094    * If a probeset fails to compute for whatever reason then this method is
00095    * called rather than the normal report call above. By default does nothing.
00096    * 
00097    * @param psGroup - List of probesets from which probes were used.
00098    * @param qMethod - Quantification method with compute method called.
00099    * @param layout - Where the probesets, probes, etc are on the chip.
00100    * 
00101    * @return true if success, false otherwise.
00102    */
00103    bool reportFailure(ProbeSetGroup &psGroup, 
00104                       QuantMethod &qMethod, 
00105                       const IntensityMart &iMart, 
00106                       std::vector<ChipStream *> &iTrans, 
00107                       PmAdjuster &pmAdjust);
00108 
00109   /** 
00110    * No more probesets will be processed, this is a chance to finish outputting
00111    * results and clean up.
00112    * @param qMethod - Quantification method that was used.
00113    * @return true if success, false otherwise.
00114    */
00115   bool finish(QuantMethod &qMethod);
00116   
00117 private:
00118   /** Swap out the .cel for .chp */
00119   void setupFileNames(const IntensityMart &iMart);
00120 
00121   /** Fill in a chp header file info. */
00122   void setupChpFile(affxchpwriter::CCHPFileWriter &chp, AnalysisInfo &info);
00123 
00124   /// Our prefix to filenames, often a path.
00125   std::string m_Prefix;
00126 
00127   /// Our algorithm name. Will be appended before .chp, i.e. mycel.cel-> mycel.algName.chp
00128   std::string m_AlgName;
00129 
00130   /// How many probesets have we seen this far?
00131   int m_CurrentProbeSetCount;
00132   /// Use for writing signals to a buffer. When the buffer is full, write it to CHP files.
00133   affxchpwriter::CCHPFileBufferWriter m_ExpressionEntryBufferWriter;
00134   /// Names of all of our cel files
00135   std::vector<std::string> m_CELFileNames;
00136   /// Names of all of our chp files, one for each cel file.
00137   std::vector<std::string> m_CHPFileNames;
00138   std::vector<std::string> m_FilesForWriter;
00139   /// All the infomation about our algorithm, etc.
00140   AnalysisInfo m_Info;
00141 };
00142 
00143 #endif /* _QUANTMETHODEXPRCHPREPORT_H_ */
